=== Free assistance to businesses in the Austin, Texas area who are using Ubuntu: ===

As a giveback to the Ubuntu community, I am happy to help any business in the Austin area that is using Ubuntu without charge.  While I am not an Ubuntu expert, I have many years experience with computers in a business setting and I personally use Ubuntu on my notebook.  I'm also <nowiki>[[http://www.lpi.org/lpi/english/certification/the_lpic_program|LPIC "certified"]]</nowiki>.  I'm looking for opportunities to help Ubuntu penetrate deeper in the business community.

More info about me at <nowiki>[[http://www.bizmark.com|http://www.bizmark.com]]</nowiki> or Email: mhicks  at  bizmark  dot  com
